name: GOV.UK Design System
description:
Welcome ðŸ‘‹


This is a collection of styles and components for rapid design of UK Government services. This is not to be used as a source of guidance or documentation on how to use the styles and components. Please visit the GOV.UK Design System for this.


Think of the current version (1.0) as the MVP. There will be many ways to improve upon it and make it a better resource but you have to start somewhere.


  • Found it useful?
  • Spot a mistake?
  • Notice a better way to create a component?


Comments, questions and improvements are always welcome. Reach out to me (@joehorton) on the UK Government Digital Slack or comment below on the community page.


Enjoy âœŒ
